messages.subject: Scorpion sukashi tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Hello to every one, I made this tsuba for an Australian guy.  Did anyone saw before one tsukashi scorpion tsuba?
messages.messageBody:
Hello to every one, I made this tsuba for an Australian guy. Did anyone saw before one tsukashi scorpion tsuba? http://www.maximom.com.ar/index_archivos/Tsubas.htm#_N%c2%ba_15_side or try http://thinurl.com/?2b3dd5 is the number 15.
Best to all,
I accept all your comments.
Sorry for those copied more than one time.
Máximo

Máximo D. Marchionni
www.maximom.com.ar
Maximo@...
